message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and we'll call it a day.
That's a tough start, Alice! How about a 55/45 split to be more even?
I'm willing to compromise, but let's get closer to a 60/40 split. It's a fair offer considering the inflation on your side.
This inflation is really hurting, Alice.  475,000 is the best I can do - it needs to be worth it for me to agree.
